scripts.network: soroban config network add --global testnet --rpc-url https://soroban-testnet.stellar.org --network-passphrase 'Test SDF Network ; September 2015'
scripts.create_deployer: soroban config identity generate deployer && soroban config identity fund deployer --network testnet
scripts.bindings: soroban contract bindings typescript --network testnet --contract-id $(cat ../.soroban/auction-id) --output-dir node_modules/soroban_auction_client
scripts.setup: npm run network && cd soroban_auction && soroban contract build && if [ ! -d ../.soroban ]; then npm run create_deployer && npm run deploy; fi && cd ..
scripts.postinstall: if [ ! -d ../.soroban ]; then npm run setup; fi && npm run bindings
